targets.rawSql:
select time, mast.state 
from machines_state mast
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = mast.machine_id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '20 seconds' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nmOperacao' as "Nome da operação"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select time, cast(state as int) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}'and time between now() - interval '30 days' and now()
order by time ASC

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nrOp' as "Número da ordem de produção"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

/*SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes' AND NOW()
order by time asc*/

SELECT extra_data ->> 'artigo' as "Artigo"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc
limit 1

select time, sum(value) as "contagem"
from machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina'
and mada.sensor_type = '01'
and $__timeFilter(time)
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'cor' as "Cor"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select (select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('5','4') and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as UpTime,
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and $__timeFilter(time) and duration < 60
group by machine_id) as AllTime from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

SELECT 
  $__timeGroup(time, '1h'), 
  sum(mada.value) as "Quantidade por hora" 
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mada.sensor_type = '01' and mach.description = '${maquina}' 
and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '12 HOURS' AND NOW()
-- $__timeFilter("time") and 
GROUP by 1
ORDER BY time asc
limit 13

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'nmCliente' as "Cliente"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

select (select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('5') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running with P.O",
(select
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('4') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <30
group by machine_id) as "Running without P.O",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('3') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Stopped machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('2') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Idle machine",
(select
SUM (duration)  
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and state in ('1','0') and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Offline",
(select 
SUM (duration) 
from machines_state ms 
inner join machines mach
on ms.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '$maquina' and $__timeFilter(time) and ms.duration <31
group by machine_id) as "Total time" from machines_state ms2 
group by 1

SELECT time, extra_data ->> 'espessuraFinal' as "Espessura Final"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '240 s' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT mada.time, mada.extra_data ->> 'nmEventoParada' as "Descrição Evento Parada"
FROM machines_data mada
inner join machines mach
on mada.machine_id = mach.id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '24 s' AND NOW()
order by time asc

select time, current -> 'nmEventoParada' as "Parada"
from machines_event maev
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = maev.machine_id
where mach.description = '${maquina}' and current -> 'nmEventoParada' notnull and current -> 'nmEventoParada' != '"null"' and "time" BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL '30d' AND NOW()
order by time desc

SELECT current -> 'nmEventoParada' as "paradas" ,
count (current -> 'nmEventoParada')
from machines_event maev
inner join machines mach
on mach.id = maev.machine_id 
where mach.description = '${maquina}'  and current -> 'nmEventoParada' notnull and current -> 'nmEventoParada' != '"null"'
group by maev."current" 
order by count(current -> 'nmEventoParada') desc
limit 3

list.description: select distinct (description) from machines order by description
list.label: Machine
list.name: maquina
